Prerequisite(s): Four Surging Shark maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: 1 round

Description

Your blows flail out like the tentacles of the mighty kraken, striking all with devastating force. After you initiate this boost, the next maneuver you initiate that targets only one creature may instead target all creatures within your reach. You may choose not to target any number of creatures you wish, but must target at least one. When utilizing this boost's effect, make a single attack and damage roll and apply it to all creatures you wish to target. You may not use this boost in conjunction with strikes that allow movement.
